001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.json;
002
003import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.TreeDumper;
004import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render.Highlight;
005import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render.Highlight.Structure;
006import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render.RenderSpec;
007
008import java.io.PrintStream;
009import java.util.ArrayDeque;
010import java.util.Deque;
011import java.util.Iterator;
012import java.util.Map;
013import java.util.Objects;
014
015/**
016 * Implementation of {@link TreeDumper} that dumps into the passed {@link PrintStream}
017 * the tree of a {@link Structure#JSON JSON} logical structure
018 * in {@link Highlight.Target#TXT_ANSI ANSI-Txt} target format.
019 */
020public class JsonTxtDumper implements TreeDumper {
021
022    final PrintStream out;
023    final RenderSpec renderSpec;
024    final Deque<String> currentPath = new ArrayDeque<>();
025
026    public JsonTxtDumper(PrintStream out, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
027        this.out = Objects.requireNonNull(out);
028        this.renderSpec = Objects.requireNonNull(renderSpec);
029    }
030
031    @Override
032    public void acceptNull() {
033        out.print(renderSpec.highlightNullAnsi(Structure.JSON));
034    }
035
036    @Override
037    public void acceptScalar(ScalarNode scalarNode) {
038        out.print(doubleQuotes());
039        out.print(renderSpec.highlightValueAnsi(Structure.JSON, scalarNode.text()));
040        out.print(doubleQuotes());
041    }
042
043    @Override
044    public void acceptSequence(SequenceNode sequenceNode) {
045        out.print(openSquareBracket());
046        int count = 0;
047        Iterator<Node> itNode = sequenceNode.sequenceItems().iterator();
048        while (itNode.hasNext()) {
049            if (count > 0) {
050                out.print(comma());
051            }
052            count++;
053            currentPath.addLast(String.format("[%d]", count));
054            out.println();
055            out.print(indent());
056            itNode.next().visit(this);
057            currentPath.removeLast();
058        }
059        if (count > 0) {
060            out.println();
061            out.print(indent());
062        }
063        out.print(closedSquareBracket());
064    }
065
066    @Override
067    public void acceptMappings(MappingsNode mappingsNode) {
068        out.print(openFigureBracket());
069        int count = 0;
070        Iterator<Map.Entry<String, Node>> itEntry = mappingsNode.mappingsItems().iterator();
071        while (itEntry.hasNext()) {
072            Map.Entry<String, Node> entry = itEntry.next();
073            if (count > 0) {
074                out.print(comma());
075            }
076            count++;
077            currentPath.addLast(String.format("(%s)", entry.getKey()));
078            out.println();
079            out.print(indent());
080            out.print(doubleQuotes());
081            out.print(renderSpec.highlightKeyAnsi(Structure.JSON, entry.getKey()));
082            out.print(doubleQuotes());
083            out.print(colonSpace());
084            entry.getValue().visit(this);
085            currentPath.removeLast();
086        }
087        if (count > 0) {
088            out.println();
089            out.print(indent());
090        }
091        out.print(closedFigureBracket());
092    }
093
094    private String indent() {
095        return "  ".repeat(currentPath.size());
096    }
097
098    private String comma() {
099        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxAnsi(Structure.JSON, ',');
100    }
101
102    private String colonSpace() {
103        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxAnsi(Structure.JSON, ": ");
104    }
105
106    private String doubleQuotes() {
107        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxAnsi(Structure.JSON, '"');
108    }
109
110    private String openSquareBracket() {
111        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxAnsi(Structure.JSON, '[');
112    }
113
114    private String closedSquareBracket() {
115        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxAnsi(Structure.JSON, ']');
116    }
117
118    private String openFigureBracket() {
119        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxAnsi(Structure.JSON, '{');
120    }
121
122    private String closedFigureBracket() {
123        return renderSpec.highlightSyntaxAnsi(Structure.JSON, '}');
124    }
125}
